climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: Happy Baby: For happy tummies and Happy Tots, try Happy Baby's full line of baby food pouches, organic Cereals, teething wafers & baby snacks and more

Happy Baby: At Happy Baby Organics, we provide organic and delicious options for your baby's nutritional journey We develop premium organic recipes perfectly matched with your child's age and stage This is enlightened nutrition for every family

Happy Baby: We provide organic, delicious options for your baby's nutritional journey; Happy Baby offers baby food pouches, organic cereals, teething wafers, baby snacks and more made for your little one

Happy Family Organics: We are on a mission to change the trajectory of children's health through nutrition; We provide age and stage appropriate premium organic food products for baby, tot, kid, and mama
Our Happy Promise: All products are certified USDA organic, made with non-GMO ingredients grown without the use of toxic persistent pesticides and in packaging made without BPA, BPS, or phthalates
body.description: Made for babies with sensitive tummies, our Sensitive organic infant formula has 75% less lactose than standard formulas and is crafted with quality ingredients, including essential nutrients and dual prebiotics. Once the canister has been opened, powdered formula can be used for one month. We don’t recommend using the formula after 30 days of opening, since the nutrients can start to degrade. If any water or moisture comes into contact with the formula, bacteria can begin to grow

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Complete nutrition with Lactose Lactose is the #1 component in breast milk, which is why it's #1 in our formula, too. Complete nutrition with Expert-recommended DHA Also found in breast milk, we include DHA to help support brain and eye development. Complete nutrition with Our GOS & FOS Helps promote softer stools, closer to breastfed infants’**. Next page 1 Lactose 2 Expert-recommended DHA 3 Dual Prebiotics

What’s the Difference Between Our Formulas? Stage 1: 0–12 months Stage 1 Sensitive: 0–12 months Stage 2: 6–12 months At-a-glance: Specially formulated to provide complete nutrition for the first year of life At-a-glance: Reduced lactose for sensitive bellies; complete nutrition for baby’s first year At-a-glance: Tailored to little ones’ development starting at 6 months Key ingredients: Made with organic lactose, prebiotics, and key vitamins & minerals. Key ingredients: Made with 75% reduced lactose for babies experiencing fussiness & gas. Key ingredients: Higher levels of key nutrients including calcium, choline, and iron.

Happy Baby Infant Formula Mixing Instructions Step 1 Wash hands and surfaces. Pour desired amount of warm water (approximately 100°F/40°C) into a clean bottle. Step 2 Add powder to water in bottle. (See Feeding Chart on back of canister.) Step 3 Cap bottle and shake well until powder is dissolved. Step 4 Feed immediately and discard used formula within 1 hour.

How many bottles can I make from one 21oz tub? You can prepare around 18–19 8-oz bottles with our 21oz tubs. How long does Happy Baby formula last? Please refer to the Use By date on the bottom of each formula tub. Once the tub has been opened, formula can be used for one month. We do not recommend using the formula after 30 days of opening. Can I prepare a bottle and store in the refrigerator? Yes, you can prepare formula in advance. Make sure to store prepared formula in the refrigerator and use it within 24 hours. Do not store any leftover formula that you have already fed to baby. What’s the best water temperature for mixing? We suggest preparing our formula with warm water (approximately 100F, or 40C). This temperature, which is just above body temp, will help to dissolve the formula properly. If the water is too cool, it will not mix properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never dig your fingers in formula again !!!
reviews.reviewText: Why do other formula company’s keep the scooper buried inside of the formula? I do not know but this company got it right. Plus I switched my baby to this formula since enfamil enfacare was tearing my baby’s stomach up and making her constipated. Haven’t had to worry about that since (at least not every single feeding like with enfacare.) no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 babies have loved it!
reviews.reviewText: I BF but have used this to supplement with 3 babies now and they’ve all loved it and had no issue going back and forth with this and breastmilk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Switch from breast milk and wow
reviews.reviewText: So my wife and I found our little hungry monster not filling up or satisfied after his feed. So we tried this formula and wow. Baby slept for a full 6 hours the first night and was a happy baby when he woke up. So we have been giving a bottle to sleep every night. But warning baby will not get satisfied off breast milk anymore. So we are switching completely. My son is happier on it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Sensitive! Babies
reviews.reviewText: This was the ONLY formula my son would tolerate for a while. It was sensitive (and taste good) enough for him! I even recommended it to my friend who was transitioning her baby from breast milk and it worked super well with her also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to baby formula
reviews.reviewText: With two little babies at home, this is my favorite formula. It doesn't smell bad. It's organic. And affordable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used HappyBaby Formula for all three of my children (& currently using this formula); I highly recommend it for any growing family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good value but some stomach upset
reviews.reviewText: This formula is one of the best deals ive seen in stores or online! my son has had some difficulty with gas after taking it and it also has a strong iron smell to it. 4/5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product - Finally found a match from my baby!
reviews.reviewText: I tried several different formulas before landing on this brand. The formula we were on at first caused my son to be extremely gassy and have excessive spit up/acid reflux. I then switched to another brand which caused my sons entire body to break out and he was still extremely gassy.FINALLY, my mom suggested we try this brand. It cleared his skin right up. He loves the flavor and has way less gas and discomfort. He no longer has acid reflux and is a happy baby.Happy with this formula and would suggest for all new moms :)
